name: Sherie Johnson
text: Really good place to go walking with dogs

name: Arlie Bright
text: The parking lot is set up in such horrible way, as to be a hinderance when entering or exiting.  Not a good idea to park enormous trucks in this area since they create a hazard when entering or exiting, they cannot be seen around, and you are just playing Russian roulette when you drive past one. I also think that there should be ordinances that ban smoking near ANY entrance of ANY business; as it is an offensive odor to have to walk through, not to mention bad for you.

text: check your rideshare ratings and your gpa, always rate 5 stars and tip.

text: I just checked into this hotel and am appalled. There dust everywhere, the floor doesn't look clean, the tub has a lot of rust. Thought Marriott had standard but apparently I was wrong.

name: Eugene Griffith
text: This is a nice state park with beautiful views!  Short hike out to the overlook along a wood walkway.  Plenty of room for a stroller or a wheelchair.   The overlook has an amazing view of the valley and other mountains.   You can hike down along the rocks at the edge of the cliff.  Restrooms are located at the beginning of the trail.  The park has plenty of camping, cottages, chalets, hotel rooms and a restaurant! Enjoy the pictures!

name: Mary Oshay
text: Great, gorgeous, beautiful , peaceful and quiet.

name: 5150 Eddie
text: The bears arent that friendly

name: Arshad Abdul
text: Close to BJCC, charges $10-$20

name: Bobbi Pritchett
text: Very upset! I went there this past Sunday (October 4, 2020) and was told to leave and that I cannot take pictures there. It was a group there before me taking pictures! 5-10 minutes after I pulled in, they left. About 5-8 minutes after they left, a “security guard” in a white truck and blue shirt pulled in and told me to leave. I see people here all the time taking pictures. I see pictures from this location posted on social media accounts.

name: Paul Calhoun
text: Plenty of parking spaces has Security well lite very easy entrance and existing and not that expensive

text: Thanks for painting over the handicapped spots and making them reserved. Im sure all of the handicapped drivers are grateful that you are making a whopping 15 to 20 dollars extra tonight.

name: Jake Sims
text: Great service here. They always cut my hair the way I want it done every time no matter who does it.

resp.text: Thank you Jake!! We appreciate you coming in!

name: Kellie Travers
text:
I came in today to get my sons hair cut, but unfortunately I had to leave before it was our turn. I wasn't expecting too long of a wait, but I was wrong...lol
These ladies are busy little bees! I love seeing the small shops in our town so active. Very friendly and seem to be well liked by all. It is a small shop, but it works. By the way, I love the old antique vanity you have up on display...awesome!
Ladies, I will be back for his next haircut and ill make sure I have time to spare in case there is a wait!

resp.text: Kellie, We thank You for your loyaltee, we work hard to get every one In and Out as fast and as we possibly can. Hope to see u next time. ☺

name: Dusty Summerford
text: Best Barbers around. Both are great with men's hair as well as women's. I highly recommend them!

resp.text: Dusty Summerford Thank You for supporting💈 Cut N Up Barber and Style 💈and Local Businesses in Hanceville Alabama 🎈

resp.text:
❤❤Thank you Shirley Potts, for taking the time to leave your thoughts.
We really appreciate your business..⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐❤❤

name: Robin Gardner
text: Kim And Amanda Are Amazing Me And My Kid's Always Go To Them To Get Our Hair Done Been Going To Them For Year's And Won't Ever Use Anyone Else ❤

resp.text: ❤Thank you Robin!! We appriciate your business...⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐😀

resp.text: Thank you Rick Bennefield!!! And Thank you for taking your time out and leaving a review. See you next round!💈✂️💈

name: Jon A
text: Cut N Up Barber & Styles is the GREATEST. I mean Perfect haircut each and everytime and the staff is so friendly and Amazing I’m definitely recommending any and everybody to go here for you’re next haircut be you man woman or child they can do it all. It’s just an all around EPIC place for anything styles highlights haircuts etc. I’d give them 10 stars if I could 🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟 I guess I can lol. But trust me u won’t be disappointed 😁👍 if you don’t believe go there yourself you’ll see what I mean.

resp.text: Thank You!!! Very Much 😎

name: Terra Janel
text: Crowded parking lot I had to park on the street just to run in for a few minutes.

name: Sharron Gregg
text: Park there for work

name: Philip Haynes
text: UAB never fails to disappoints

name: Kristal Moore
text: My stay was wonderful until two days later. We checked in on 7-3-21 and was charged the total that was on the reservation. 302.00 plus 32 dollars extra, I was told this was for incidentals and would be reimbursed on check out. the next morning we had room service breakfast for 30 dollars. Then we checked out. So we knew our total charges should be 302 plus 30. which is 332 which has already been paid. so a credit for about 11 dollars would post sometime this week I assumed. On 7-6-21 my bank account was not credited anything and was charged $365.40, This make my checking account negative so now I will have service charges also. I called and spoke with Kendrick Delaney the manager on duty. He said he only saw the one charge and needed to see my bank statement before he could do anything. I sent him an email and he said he would check that and call me back as soon as possible. I waited for a call back because I told him we had no money and no access to the bank account because of the overdraft of double charging me and because this overdrafted my account and he assured me I would hear back from him. He never called me back. The next morning I called and spoke with a woman that said it was too early in the morning for anyone there to help me. I later saw a short email from Kendrick Delaney that said my email did not show the bank statement so he couldn't help. He did not call me back so I could resend it. This needed to be handled asap. and it still has not been handled. I need a call back. I have re-emailed him my bank statement where we have been charged a total of $around $747.00 for one night and a breakfast. and should have been a total of 332. This is completely ridiculous. We are struggling today and so are our children, Than money was going to carry us thru until payday friday.

name: Rakhee Patel
text: Great place to stay when in the beautiful city visiting and very friendly staff!

name: Steelers EF
text: Top notch facility with excellent restaurant.

name: Nicole Roper
text: Absolutely Beautiful!!

text: This is the main parking lot for the uptown area restaurants. This is a non attendant paid parking lot. When you enter you hit the button on the kiosk for a ticket. Take the ticket with you and get it stamped at a restaurant to redeem for free parking.

text: It's a parking deck. There are paid access options if you don't have a decal.

text: Bit overpriced. Got evacuated due to incoming storm. The beach was perfect though. Soft sand, beautiful waves, clean beach, and visitors were all respectful.

name: Tony Whaley
text: you know in a way I wished I lived on that beach it is a beautiful beach however the surf had been washed out my wife fell and almost broke her ankle just off of the sand her clumsiness is not y'all's fault but we are planning to come back in on April 15th we look forward to our trip to gulf shores

name: JL Reyes
text: Nice and clean

text: Very great customer service. Always very helpful and communicate with their tenants very well. Highly recommend them for storage needs.

resp.text: Thanks so much Caron! We appreciate your business.

text: Very nice place to store your stuff. Great security and clean lot and storages. Would have gave it a five star but they’re little on the high side of cost.

text: Great staff and prices

resp.text: Thank you for your business. We are happy you were pleased with our facility.

name: Annette Sebastian
text: Great storage facility with top notch security and service.   So easy to work with them.   We have stored our camper here and have a large indoor, climate-controlled unit.

resp.text: Thanks, Annette. We appreciate you :)

name: Rebekah McCoy
text: We stored our pop-up camper here while we had it for sale and we had a wonderful experience! Very professional, very clean! Easy to find, right there on county road 64! Well built, very nice facility! And the peace of mind we had knowing our valuable camper was safe and sound was priceless! Thank you 64 storage! We’re glad you’re here!

resp.text: Thank you so much, Rebekah! We enjoyed having you here :)

name: Erica Chishti
text:
Great prices we had a climate controlled unit
Kept very clean and it's very secure (the built in locks helped us with our decision)
Friendly and professional if we need to then we will definitely be back again

resp.text: Thank you for your kind review. It was a pleasure doing business with you.

name: Thomas Gautney
text: Good facilities, location, staff

resp.text: Thank you for your business. We are happy you were pleased with our facility.

name: Ryan S
text: The units here are clean and convenient.  We have another unit at the other large competing storage place 1/4 mile down the road and it's no where near as cleanly - the lockers are full of insects.  I have nothing but good things to say about this location.  The only thing I can say is you must use their tubular locks and cannot use your own, which may or may not be of concern to you.

resp.text: Thank you Ryan. We appreciate your business!

name: Joe Fulmer
text: Nice clean and affordable. Great service there.

text: Rat infested...ate n2 belongings...bugs were bad also...

resp.text: This person has never been a tenant of ours.  We are  located in a field surrounded by farms so there may be an occasional rodent however, we have professional pest control that maintains our facility monthly.

name: Nikki Englehart
text: Great spaces !

resp.text: Thanks, Nikki! We aim to please!

name: Anthony Forshee
text: Love it here! Kaitlyn and the other girl have been very nice and easy to work with. They got me in and out quick during move in and then escorted me out to my unit. Very professional!

name: Alexus Mccormack
text: Went in wanting to rent a space and Aja was phenomenal! Unfortunately they didn’t have any units available that fit my needs but I would definitely recommend that you go here! All my questions were very thoroughly answered. I felt very welcomed and hope to be able to rent here in the near future. I found it very comforting that I had someone express all of my options but never force anything upon me.

name: Patricia Hunter
text: The two young ladies in the office are very nice and professional and go above and beyond for their customers. Very clean property as well.

name: Alena “Lenna” Richardson
text: This place and staff are so nice! I was having trouble renting online but Kaitlyn helped me so much!!! Very satisfied, thank you Kaitlyn!

name: Torrey Strong
text: Went here looking for some storage so that I could store some of my excess belongings that I didn't need for my move, and the customer service was on point. The lady that assisted me (Aja) was very friendly and was able to answer all of my questions.

name: BILL M (HAWKEYE)
text: Great storage unit no issues except the only negative thing is their hours but otherwise it’s a great place

name: kevin lofty
text: I enjoy the online documents and bill pay but when I've had a need for human interaction they've been friendly and helpful

name: Glenda Story
text: Aaron and the girls were just great and so helpful. Their facility was clean and I always felt safe going and coming.

name: Ryan Norton
text: Great first experience.... very detailed and helpful with all questions and even with explaining how things work!

name: Chino E
text: Great storage place! Super friendly and helpful staff! Overall very clean and easy access!

text: Awesome overall experience. The manager Kaitlyn was extremely helpful and nice. 👍🏻👍🏻

name: Zachery Jackson
text: Yooo y’all need to store your things here and look for KAIT in particular because she’s super helpful with finding a good unit to fit your needs and she’s super patient and their prices are really good for what you need

name: Agaitha Johnson
text: Aaron was very helpful. Glad I choose this place!

text: Excellent experience.  Aaron is the best!

text: The manager Kaitlyn was very nice and helpful!

text: Kaitlyn the store manager was very helpful and knowledgeable!!

name: Jordan Connolly
text: Kaitlyn the store manager was super helpful 👌

name: Kayce Aultman
text: Fantastic and so helpful!

name: Chad Byers
text: Just went in to price check because I will be moving within the next few weeks, the gal in there was very helpful

name: Anthony Pellegrino
text: The best experience I have had when storing my valuables. The Store Manager, Brittany H. was extremely helpful when I setup my first storage unit. I ended up needing two more units and she was able to get me all of them close together and at a reasonable rate. They are very customer oriented and extremely helpful. I even received a phone call to make sure that I was not late on a payment in order not to assess late charges. The facility is very clean and has been extremely safe. I would definitely recommend this to anyone needing short or long term storage.

name: Christopher Campbell
text:
I encountered the Manager, or perhaps The young lady who was in fact 100% No doubt bout it, The Woman who was IN CHARGE. making decisions, saving lives, cutting costs, while earning tax break as store most admired by environmental E-85 ‘GOING GREEN”

As scary as the following sounds.......This is a True story........I made a binding agreement in writing, basically submitting toMs Higdon offers, claims, fairytales, sourcery, magic tricks, circus stunts, deception, forgery, etc etc, etc.....All basic standard tactics employed by most any women, basically In any female agreement.

I am BLOWN AWAY at this effort &action taken by this fabulous young lady, who is most pleasant 2 have a convo and making any real world type agreements.....I MUST SAY, CC here, most impressed by this woman.......This is a FACT, anytime I want 2 stowaway any of this guy valuables.......well I sure do know. Where I want to be in just an old fashion, feel good moments when you know your in very capable & gooD hands of authority, oversight, and control

GO BAMA, ROLLTIDE!!!!

name: Breonna Williams
text: Just price checking, seems like a nice place. The lady there was super nice and helpful. Will probably return to rent.

name: Dian Beaubien
text: Do not use this storage facility for Motorhome storage. I had my rv stored there 5 days.  In that short time, someone came in a cut my catalytic converter off causing me $1485 in damage.   They did say it was happening and was not the first.  But THEY are not responsible,  I’m filing a police report, but be very careful about your rv storage here.

name: Kevin Da King
text: Great place, great price, great customer service from both the guy and gal when I visit. John just broke down all the options I have for when I get my stuff out of storage this month and I didn’t even ask. Just volunteering the important extra information and going that extra mile for the customer. I highly recommend this place and the staff.

name: Deangelo Smith
text: The facility is well kept. Units are in great condition. The manager, Joel, was extremely helpful. Any question or concern I had, he had an immediate, reassuring response. This is my first time renting a storage unit and based off my experience I have nothing negative to say about this location or my experience. Two thumbs up!!

name: Eric Joyce
text: Unbelievably Great. Thank you John for fighting for the best deal for me. Thank you Brittany for your great service as well for my fourth unit. You both are great!!

name: Anne Hughes
text: Brittany and Sean were great! They are always so helpful every time I come in the office. I highly recommend!!

name: Blank Man
text: Great place to store your belongings. The staff is very friendly. I can't remember the name guy that is there majority of the time. Regardless this place is where you want to store your stuff and most importantly it's affordable.

name: Jessica Cunningham
text: Convenient location. Friendly staff. But they keep raising the rates and did nothing to get rid of the mice in my unit.  I had to personally get them out. Insurance didn't cover any damages and I am still having to enter my unit with caution because of the critters trying to move back in.

name: Amy Mansell
text: I can’t say enough about this facility. These guys are awesome! Year after year they donate a unit to the Tent City Project in efforts to help our city’s homeless community. Joel and his staff are simply amazing. If I could get them 10 stars, I would! I recommend over any other!

name: Latoya Herring
text: I was looking for the best prices that were near where my grandmother lives( the storage is for her), and decided to try this place. John went above and beyond for me. He showed me a space and gave me prices on said spaces, told me everything up front so that way there were no surprises. For that i will always be grateful thanks John for taking the time out for me and my questions.

name: John White RCDD
text: Great place. Great service. Clean units. Cameras and fence. Plenty of room. Average prices.

name: Chase Downing
text: Aislinn had a great attitude and was extremely helpful. I would highly recommend to friends or family.

name: Carolyn Hastings
text:
I moved to Alabama recently, and I rented a storage locker from LifeStorage on rte 72 in Madison on the enthusiastic recommendation from a neighbor who had previous experience with them.

First, the facility has everything you might expect, and then some.  It is super clean, well lighted and well paved.  The security is excellent, with 24/day 7 days/week access to the lockers through a security coded gate. Todd and Joel are extremely helpful, and do everything they can to make the experience go as smoothly as possible. In fact, I even got a phone call from Todd last week to let me know that my lock hadn't properly engaged the locking mechanism -- so they even check to make sure that the individual lockers are secure.

I have rented storage lockers at four facilities in three different states.  I liked each of the places I dealt with, but this is definitely the best.

Highly recommended.

name: Jason Troutman
text: They were very helpful and polite!  Also a very convenient and secure system. I would definitely recommend to a friend.

name: Tanya Murray
text: After searching many self storage units co-located to my rental, I stopped in here at lunch on Monday. Todd discussed the various rental sizes and costs associated, including insurance and then took me for a tour of the facility actually opening a vacant unit to verify the size I had inquired about. I went back the following day and rented a unit. If you are looking for exceptional customer service that is what you will get from these guys. Very helpful, units were clean and prices are reasonable. Glad I stopped.

name: Brad French
text: Nice lady, decent prices. Would recommend

name: Joe Velasquez
text: I was very impressed with the way Joel handled my inquiry.  Joel made sure I understood all aspects of renting a storage area.  He provided a tour of the facility including both external and climate controlled storage areas.  I rented my storage from Joel who is by far the best storage manager I have met.

name: Diana Tuten
text: Mr. Brian was extremely helpful and professional for my entire time I had my household goods in storage (4.5 years).  The facility was so clean and safe, which means a lot to me.  I felt so welcomed every time I stepped into the office--which was great! If I ever need a storage unit again I will most definitely put my goods in the units at this location!! 😉👍

name: FOR Rescue
text: As a not for profit, volunteer run animal rescue group, we often times have to rely on the generosity of area businesses. This facility helped us immensely during a recent shoe drive that we participated in. We couldn’t have done it without them. They were wonderful.

name: Dale Carter
text: Staff are courteous, professional, and helpful. Facilities are clean, well lit, and well maintained. Associated products are available at reasonable cost. Offers easy access to online maintenance of personal accounts.  Involves only a 5 calender day grace period before late payment fees apply. A reasonable extension to this grace period for established long term customers would personally gain a 6th star in future reviews:)

name: ac lopez
text: First time using storage facility, location was great and maintained very well. Joel provided an excellent tour and answered all questions with great detail. Highly recommended!

name: Angela Jenkins
text: The guys provide excellent customer service! I like their ethics and follow through. Their prices are better than advertised, and the facilities are clean and well managed.

name: Kimberly Lamar
text: Brittany was EXTREMELY helpful and made getting my first storage unit the easiest experience. Super friendly and professional girl!

name: Tyler Brown
text: Despite being here for a short time, my experience was everything I needed and more. Ian and his staff were more than accommodating to my needs, and worked with me until my wife and I were ready to move into our new home. Rates are reasonable, and the facilities are clean and well lit. I would recommend these facilities to anyone looking for a quick solution or a long-term.

name: Rj Robinson
text: Joel and his staff are amazing! I highly recommend this facility because they are courteous and will make sure your trusted items are secure! They treat their customers with the utmost respect! Great job!

name: Sharonda Russell
text: Joel was the best. I was traveling from Nashville and he stayed after hours for me to make it in. They were so helpful and so nice. Thanks again!

name: Early Man
text: Great customer service. Clean property. Would highly recommend.

name: Ben Grady
text: Went in to inquire about prices as I have just recently moved to the area, the manager was helping another lady when I came in but was very polite and professional

name: Sherelle Gilbert
text: I had a great experience with Life Storage. The prices were very reasonable and the staff was awesome! I would recommend them for your storage needs in this area!

name: Lisa Scott
text: Great service, decent prices. Would recommend.

name: Beth Pearson
text: Service is always great! Would definitely recommend.

name: Kelli Conerly
text: Great experience! Joel took great care of me and really cares about the customer! I would definitely recommend this to anyone

name: John Wood
text: This is a great place to get storage, the facilities are clean and well kept, the staff are awesome and always there to help when needed.  They even went out of their way to check our motorhome after a wind storm so I didn't have to run down and look.  I'd recommend this place to anyone wanting storage space.

name: B Royer
text:
Brittany Higdon is the best manager to serve store #351 in 5 years! Having personal experience with the operations of this company, she has the potential to be a top performer. Having rented here off and on for more than a decade, she has raised the standards back to what they were in 2012. Keep up the good work and tweak the small things.
To customers, this is the best facility to rent from if you want peace of mind that your things are safe and will be cared for, rent at this location.  Life Storage, formerly Uncle Bob's is a wonderful company to work for and they care about their customer base! Shout out to Williamsville!

name: Nick Denny
text: Let me begin with the positive: lots of room to enter the lot and maneuver.  That's where the good ends...  There are significant gaps in important information given online as well as from the employees.   You must bring a paper copy of insurance, it seems easy and somewhat a reasonable request, but they don't tell you till you arrive to sign...you have to either leave to print it or call your insurance company to fax it.  Also there is no agreed truck usage at this location, in fact there is no truck, there is a van at another location and its not free, you have to pay $20 for the commercial insurance...though the employee told me my personal vehicle insurance would work...paper copy.  Lastly, the size of the unit is 'nominal' meaning they are rounding UP to 10'x10' from the actual 9'x9.5'.  If I hadn't already gone through the hassle of signing and paying for the unit already, I would go somewhere else...

name: B B
text: The employees and staff of Life Storage are wonderful in helping their local community like thru The Tent City Project.  Any company who is willing to help and benefit their communities is a business I would want to associate with and do business with. Thank you!

name: D Lifeform
text: Shopping around for almost anything these days is often exhausting, frustrating, and disappointing. Therefore, it was a most pleasant surprise to find that customer service is indeed alive and well at the LifeStorage store #351 on Highway 72 West, in Madison, AL.  I would like to sincerely thank Joel Sherman, Store Manager, and Brittany, for their professionalism, as well as their kindness.  The fabulous customer service I received absolutely tipped the scales in favor of my renting a storage unit here, rather than at a competitor's store.  I was also extremely impressed with how immaculate the facility is, both inside and out.  I am quite pleased with the entire experience I had here and look forward to my future dealings with Joel and Brittany.  Thank you!

name: Donna Morris
text: Would definitely recommend this place, Sean and Brittany were so helpful!

name: Timothy Boyd
text: Went in to buy some boxes & Brittany gave great customer service! Definitely coming again.

name: Kattgames
text: First time renting a storage unit.  The staff made it very easy.   They answered all my questions and gave me some good advice.  They really helped me out.

name: C MURDER Davies
text: Kaitlyn the store manager!

name: Joe P
text: Used their facility in Highway 72. Easy to get in and out. Affordable. Really nice staff. And clean.

name: Heather Friedman
text: I have used this location in the past and came back when I needed some extra space again. The staff is always friendly and the units are clean. I strongly recommend Life Storage in Madison.

name: Lynzey Smith
text: Excellent service, very competitive rates, and clean...very pleased and drive over 25min past the competition to go! Well worth it! Todd, the Asst manager, was very kind to both me and my family...

name: Kevin Jarvis
text: Nice place, staff was extremely nice and helpful and made the process very easy. Would recommend this life storage to anyone.

name: Bootleg Baby
text: Excellent service-great gals!

name: Wendy Qualls
text: Really helpful staff, clean facilities, and they're upfront about costs so you don't get hit with any surprises. (Not that there were many to get hit with.)  Would definitely recommend.

name: Regina Hale
text: Todd was absolutely wonderful with answering all of my questions to explaining the details of each step of the rental process. His customer service was excellent and very much appreciated!

name: Paula Uren
text: Great place to rent from. Brittany was super helpful!! Would definitely recommend to anyone.

name: Alpha G Male
text: Everything you need in a storage facility, gated, well-lit and most importantly clean and well structured.   I not only have two storage lockers there but I have also rented U-Haul vehicles from them.  Eric the manager is top-notch and very professional.

name: Jimmy Brazelton
text: Brittany is an example of great customer service.

name: Candi Bickers
text: These folks are so awesome. They even donate a unit for the Tent City Project that collects so much for the homeless. Way to go!

name: Heather Seals-Fox
text: Wonderful customer service! Great prices and great deals! I wouldn't want to go any where else!

name: Ashlee Byers
text: Excellent and pleasant experience! Very knowledgeable and friendly staff. I would definitely recommend this facility to anyone in the Huntsville/Madison area.

name: Ken Wilson
text: Closed out my unit today - Bryan was at the store. Very helpful. Have used this location for a couple years and very happy with security and cleanliness as well as helpfulness of the staff.

name: Leah Johnson
text: Joel was so helpful getting our unit set up. Clean and safe location . I would definitely recommend to anyone in need of storage . Prices are reasonable too !

name: Denise Walker
text: Joel and Todd were awesome! I'd recommend anyone to use this storage facility.  24h access and super sucure.  I'll definitely use next time I need to store suff!!

name: Robert J
text: Great facility!!! Also affordable prices.

name: Betty Ferrell
text: I haven't actually used the sto rage but I have have heard the wonderful services..and the donations given especially to The Tent City Project and that was more moving than I could put into words. ..

name: Ovy RiveraB
text: Good prices and plenty of courtesy.

name: Marvin Baker
text: Great group of guys and workers..always very professional and i couldn't have picked a better place for storage....highly recommended

name: Marigene Wilkins
text: Best prices, very helpful and courteous staff! Definitely recommend.

name: sabrina marshall
text: I used their storage for two years,never missing a payment! In May I began a new move and couldn't get all my storage that day! Joel called and made an agreement with me at a later date and when I went to retrieve my property, Todd would not adhere to the agreement Joel and I made and was very argumentative during our whole conversation! I decided to let the property go at a loss but yet they keep billing me for the property that I could not come back and Get! I should not have to pay billing and release my property to them at the same time! Todd is very argumentative, but  Joel values Customer service!

name: Jerry Furr
text: Wonderful people to work with they even offered to help!!! Best experience we've  ever had with storage facilities!

name: Zach Miles
text: Miss Brittany is the best her customer service is stellar.

name: Robert Mowery
text: Todd and Joel represent your company as very outstanding professionals . I appreciate both of these men . Bob Mowery

name: LaWanna Spearman
text: I dealt with Ian when I went in. He was very nice, welcoming, and friendly!! I would DEFIANTLY recommend this facility if you want fast friendly service 😊😁

name: Priscilla “Cil” Williams
text: Friendly staff, very helpful. The facility is clean and having 24 hour access is really convenient.

name: Kevin Miller (websolete)
text: Great facility, great service.  Joel was extremely helpful and I just can't recommend this location enough!

name: Patsy Jackson
text: Todd was great and very friendly. Storage location is very clean , well kept and nice.

name: David Reid
text: Great place and easy to work with. I'd suggest them to anyone needing some storage.

name: Liser 231
text: Rates are very reasonable, location is good, very clean and not run down, surveillance, and the Store Manager Joel Sherman was very helpful. Highly recommend renting a storage unit from here if you are in search for one.

name: Scott Spurrier
text: Helped out our Pack with a storage solution for cub scout equipment, rate was very generous and exceeded our expectations

name: Wendy Spurrier
text: A very safe, clean facility with friendly staff that help me with what I needed.

name: Lawanna Spearman
text: Tod was very friendly. Ive been there almost a year now and the facilities are the greatest I love the company thank you

name: Garett Brown
text: Great service. Able to meet my needs on short notice. 👍👍

name: Jenni Cherry
text: The employees and management at  life storage have gone above and beyond to help when I had fallen behind on my payments. I have never come in contact with any employee that wasn't helpful and friendly.

name: sam zuaiter
text: Great service, friendly managers and most likely they care about your satisfaction

name: Sarah
text: Fantastic service, clean units, & will work with you upon move in & out to make sure you don't pay for space you won't be using. Ian was especially great to work with!!

name: Carolyn Cooper
text: I went in to get boxes and Crystal and Bryan were so attentive to my needs and made my purchase so easy. Thanks guys!

name: Thomas Lawless
text: Great place 5 out of 5. Brittany is the bomb.

name: Charles McCarthy
text: Excellent facility that's clean and modern,  and very friendly staff.

name: Marvin Baker
text: Great qroup of guys.very nice and professional.they are highly recommended..

name: Donna Pike-Smith
text: Todd is a great assistant manager!  He and Joel keep Madison 351 the Best run storage in Madison County!!!

name: Richard Torres
text: I rarely ever have to use a storage unit but due to recent circumstances I found that I needed a place to store my goods for awhile. I happend to be driving by Life storage after visting some sketchy storage facilities with I might add some really rude managers. I walked into the office and was Immeditely greeted by the Manager Joel, right off the bat I could tell that he really new his business he took the time to ask some questions and drove me around to see some units, the place is immaculate, very clean with great security, even though I dont know the manager he made me feel welcomed and was a big help to me. THANK YOU JOEL.

name: M. Johnson
text: You don't want to be a long time customer. There is no loyalty to you they will go up every year. So don't plan on staying long unless you want to pay exorbitant fees.

name: L P
text: Very clean and well lit. Friendly, knowledgeable, accommodating staff.

name: Gordon Bowling
text: Service. That I received was very professional and met all of my needs thanks crystal Brian and ian

name: DeJuan Lamar
text: Never had a problem, great service

name: Lindsey Coggin
text: Me. Brian was very friendly and helpful. A pleasant guy and pleasure to work with.

name: Daphne Rooks
text: My visit there was great  Mr.Brain Hall was very helpful it was very clean and pleasant. Thanks for everything Brain!

name: Michelle Vasquez
text: Awesome service! Mr. Sherman went above and beyond will definitely recommend to family and friends.

name: James Noel
text: Very courteous.  The facility is very clean.  Brian was very helpful.

name: Nathan Smith
text: Great guys and very helpful. During business hours I see them out in the lot checking on people in the hot weather.

name: amanda todd
text: Joel was very helpful . Great place !

name: Fabian Klamer
text: Fantastic! Barbara and Mark were very helpful.

name: Lindsey Shafer
text: Super helpful, quick, and informative service!

name: Living Waters
text: Great and fast service... would use again

name: Joe McConnell
text: Professional staff and easy to use.

name: V3 Mathews
text: Great customer service and highly recommended

name: Moka Tay
text: Unbelievably great!

name: David Hartless
text: Really great service and great facility!

name: Anthony Williams
text: Received great customer service from Brian Hall.

name: Al Davis
text: OK business. In the past they had poor customer service. Took us a long time to get MGT to realize they were over charging us.

name: Ashley Gray
text: If only there was a 10 star option!

name: Tricia P
text: Awesome service!!! Great facility!!!

name: FUNSIZE 00
text: Very pleasant and helpful

name: Misook Jeong
text: Mr.Todd Bender Thank you for Your help.

name: Temaris Hernton
text: Ok

name: Raina Anders
text: Very rude manager.

name: Matthew Dull
text: Excellent!!!

name: BENNYGARCÍAMIX Y SU WIRI WIRI ALABAMA
text: Good

name: Amarie
text: Joel is awesome!!!!!

name: Al Joy
text: Brain Hall Rocks!!!!

name: Sergio Chargualaf
text: I've had a storage unit here for nearly 2 years. Never had any issues from them. Courteous staff and well maintained

name: Patrick Bell
text: Cool spot

name: Joseph Monarch
text: This has been the easiest process I have ever had with storage.  The facilities are nice and well maintained.

resp.text: Thanks for the awesome review Joseph!  We work hard to make your sef storage experience with us as easy and Pleasant as possible.

name: Gary Smith
text: Rented online and received codes and access immediately.  Super clean and easy in and out.

resp.text: Hi Gary, we’re glad to hear your online rental process was nice and easy.  We aim to please!

name: Jennifer Kerry
text: Angie was absolutely the best at getting me the first storage unit I needed and then the second one I needed right across from each other so I was lucky. She was fantastic about me moving out. She was great anytime I had questions. She also helped my daughter get a storage building and my ex-husband to get a storage building so she really took care of the whole family like a pro and we are so happy with her. Cleanest storage building I’ve ever seen in all my 44 years and the best people to work with you.

resp.text: Hi Jennifer, it makes us happy to hear that you had such a great experience, and thank you so much for referring your family members.  We love to make our customers happy and we love to get great feedback too.  Thanks for choosing USA Storage Centers!

name: Roger Dannery
text:
So far, so good!
Just rented an unit from Angie, all good so far, will update in the future...

resp.text: Hi Roger. We hope that all your experience is positive from beginning to end. We will do our part. We truly appreciate your business.

name: Christina Duffy
text: went in to look at storage units and get prices for my daughter. Angie was very friendly and knowledgeable and answered all of my questions. i will be passing this information to my daughter to make her decision and recommending these units for her storage needs

resp.text: Glad to hear you received excellent customer service Christina!  We look forward to assisting your daughter with her storage needs.

name: Blake Gilliam
text: Great Experience with this storage facility

resp.text: Hi Blake, we are grateful for your great review! We truly appreciate your business and support.

name: Kathy Mann
text: Angie is great! She goes above and beyond to make sure clients are taken care of!

resp.text: Hi Kathy, thank you for taking the time to review us. We're glad that our customers are having a great experience at USA Storage Centers.

name: Cory Baer
text: Clean facility, easy application process, professional and friendly management, and an easy termination process.  There is nothing to improve upon.  Thank you.

resp.text: Dear Cory, thank you so much for taking the time to leave a great review! We really appreciate your business. Please let us know what we can do for you in the future.

name: Melanie Shackleford
text: Fantastic business and great staff!

resp.text: Dear Melanie, the team at USA Storage Centers Madison is thrilled to receive such a great review, thank you!

name: Angela Simmons
text: The storage place is out there. But we took the Grandson to get his hair twisted.at Tams Beauty Shop.who recently moved there. An its always a good experience there. Tamara is a Master Stylist.an does great work.We all go to her. An she's nice an professional. An cares about her clients.

name: Laurel Thomas
text: Great experience with the staff. Rented community room and was very pleased. Would definitely use for meetings and storage needs.

resp.text:
Dear Laurel,
Great to hear you had a positive experience with us.

name: VDJ MikeyMike
text: Pulled into the parking lot with my service dog, that was feeling sick. He was about throw up.  I pulled to the end of the building and let my dog out, so he might puke or release diarrhea to feel better, and this lady comes out screaming at me to get off her property.  I explained the situation and she called the police.  I explained that he's a service dog, showed her the Service dog ID and dog tag,  and she said she didn't care.  Took photos of my license plate and everything.  I am now waiting for the police to arrive, because I didn't do anything wrong.  Nice people...

name: Dandy
text: Nice and clean facilities, friendly staff, and affordable units. Very family oriented people.

name: Nathanael B.
text: Great location and great service.

resp.text:
Dear Nathanael,
Thanks for your great review!

name: K L
text: Very professional service and clean facility. Love the fact that they are locally owned and support other local businesses.

name: Karen Barnard
text: Very helpful staff and very clean units.

name: Katara Reed
text: Very courteous & clean !

resp.text:
Dear Katara,

Thanks for your 5-star review!

name: Matthew Conde
text: TOP NOTCH FLORIST! Bella Blooms is always on the spot with providing excellent, quick service with a reasonable price! They are very creative when it comes to their floral designs (not just flowers in a vase). Highly recommend!

name: Peyton Gans Booth
text: I just got married on Halloween and I was shocked by the magic Jason & Michelle worked for me!! Honestly the most beautiful floral arrangements I'd ever seen. I received so many compliments. Jason is SO easy to talk to and listened to all of my requests. HIGHLY recommend!!

name: rick merriam
text: This is the real deal florist. They have the best service and the best flower arrangement my wife has ever seen. I used to go to Homewood to get her flowers but not any more. This place is worth the drive

name: Amy B
text: Beautiful flowers and very kind staff. Highly recommend!

name: carla irwin
text: Desiree and Kat were so amazing to us and the flowers were beyond amazing.  They were a true part of our wedding in every sense and I will miss talking with them.  I feel like we found not only a brilliant florist, but we found friends.  They took our vision and made it a reality.

name: Mary Hales-Ward
text: Being unable to attend a family funeral, I wanted to send something heartfelt and beautiful.  They did not disappoint.  The spray was outstanding and beautiful.  They completed it and delivered it in a timely manner and my expectations were exceeded.  I am so thankful I found them.

name: gabrielle byrd
text: Incredibly talented and incredibly helpful! I loved my flower arrangements and it was such a quick and easy process!

name: Janis Laws
text: I live in NC and my sweet daughter-in-law lost her grandmother.  I had no idea what florist to contact, but I was very impressed with this website.  The gentleman answering the phone was extremely nice and helpful, and even offered to deliver the plant to her home when he got off work at 5:00.  I am very glad I chose this place.  He did exactly what he said he would do and my daughter-in-law said the plant was beautiful.  Thank you for the great customer service, Bella Blooms and Designs.

name: Shelley Carrigan
text: I ordered a basket and was a given a janky wood box with stems as the handles. The flowers were not vibrant and colorful, but they were dark and dull. On top of being unhappy with the flowers- Rodd Sinclair made it worse. His attitude is going to ruin this business. I'll order from Alabaster florist next time...I dont think they would hang up on me.... lets not forget to mention that they deleted my yelp review.

name: Mark Stephenson
text: Great job especially for a last minute call! She loved them

name: Patrick Lee
text: Stopped in to get flowers sent to my wife on Valentine's Day. They were delightful to deal with, and the flowers looked amazing. Would absolutely recommend them to anyone in the area.

name: Lori Daza
text:
AMAZING customer service. Very easy to work with, friendly, courteous, knowledgeable... I can go on and on about how amazing they are but everyone should go find out more by choosing this place for your floral/gift needs! You will not be disappointed.
Rod went above and beyond for me when I called to make an order. I've honestly never had a better experience with a company. He was extremely accommodating and very very helpful; not to mention the flowers I ordered looked absolutely beautiful!
The quality of my bouquet was more than I expected.
Will definitely come back!

name: tesla nichole
text: I used Pelham Flowers for the first time today to send Mother's Day flowers. They were very helpful when I called and worked with my budget. The arrangement they put together and sent was beautiful!! It was so much better than I had even expected. I will definitely used Pelham Flowers again. I recommend you try them, also!

name: Ellen Fleisher
text: Excellent!!! My husband and I used Pelham Flowers by Desiree for all our wedding and rehearsal flowers. We LOVED her work. She helped us create the perfect look we were hoping for at great price.She offered creative suggestions and was extremely professional.  I have used Pelham Flowers for several events and bought flowers from her for friends and family. Desiree is creative and wonderful to work with. I highly recommend her to anyone looking for an awesome florist!

name: Henry Collins
text: The best place to get flowers. They are known for their modern and funky flower designs. I got flowers for my girlfriend from Pelham Flowers By Desiree last year for Valentines and it was absolutely gorgeous. Their products are by far the best priced among the flower shops in Birmingham area. The best thing I like about them are they use flowers from local growers around Jefferson and Shelby county. When you buy flowers from them you are actually contributing to the local economy. How cool is that? I ordered my flowers from them again this year to be delivered to my girlfriends work. I am excited to see their creation.

name: Mo Pop
text: Desiree did my wedding flowers and they were so beautiful! I couldn't have asked for better! The colors were perfect and they were so unique! Love this florist and will definitely use them again!

name: Jennifer Jacobs
text: I cannot recommend Flowers By Desiree enough. I am in Charleston, SC and I was trying to arrange a flower delivery for a family member who needed a bright spot in her day. The staff members were so helpful and explained what flowers they had available and delivered them to her just a few hours later. The descriptions did not do the flowers justice they were just beautiful!!! Thank you so much Flowers By Desiree!!!!!

name: Melissa Lesueur
text:
Pelham  Flowers by Desiree  and her staff are very nice, and their work is Amazing! I contacted Desiree to do a blanket of silk flowers for my Mother's funeral. My Brother's and I  met the with Desiree and gave her our Idea of what we wanted and the budget. Once we saw the flowers we were blown away of how amazing the flowers looked so real. This lady is very talented, and  you can tell that she absolutely loves what she does. Desiree went above and beyond our expectations!
We will not use any one else!

name: Pam Chut
text: My husband recently surprised me with a bouquet from Pelham Flowers by Desiree.  Beautiful flowers and super fresh.  Love them!  Still fresh as new five days later.

name: Cliff Chappell
text: I ordered flowers for a funeral, and they were very helpful in offering suggestions over the phone. The flowers were awesome.  I will definitely order from there again.  I highly recommend them and will recommend them to anyone I know needing flowers.  Thanks for the great service and product.

name: Jason Moore
text: Best place in Birmingham to get your flowers! Unique floral designs and great service! I highly recommend this florist to all my friends!

name: joseph sowder
text: Great florist. Have used for more than 1 wedding venue. Would use again.

name: Dr Kelsey Graham
text: A couple of our neighbors graciously sent a plant to my wife who has a lengthy hospital stay.  I give the low rating here for two reasons- 1. A professional would have first checked with the hospital to ensure that plants or flowers were allowed. In my wife's case NONE are allowed on the entire floor where she is being kept. The plant was simply left at the nurses station and the staff of Pelham Flowers simply skipped away happily counting their dollars regardless of whether the intended party could ever enjoy the purchase or not. 2. The card that was placed on the plant is an over the top advertisement for Pelham Flowers. It is nothing more than a business brochure with a small print line indicating who the intended benefactor of the plant is.  Welcome to Amerika home of the god $$$$$ humans be damned! Money rules in spite of delivery or not. And please let us over promote ourselves in hospitals all around town by using the greeting card as nothing more than a advertisement!!!! Yeah!!!! No thanks. Totally inconsiderate and thoughtless taking of money- pure greed Amerikan style.

name: Karla Watson
text: I love the friendly employees and their smalltown ideals! They are willing to go above and beyond to please their customers. Most of all, the flowers are GORGEOUS!! They can arrange them in any style you like...just ask them!! :)

name: Alan Thomas
text: The arrangement was wonderful, delivery timing was perfect, and everything had such a personal and caring touch.  Desiree really put together something wonderful, and I wish I could post a picture of the gorgeous arrangement she created for me.  The wife loved it, and her coworkers were jealous.  I'm sure next time they get flowers sent to them, they will tell their boyfriends and husbands to call Desiree.

name: Miles Akins
text: From the groom's perspective - we were on a budget for our wedding.  We met with 3 other florists before Desiree, and they all said they had ideas to keep us in budget, but their quotes said otherwise.  Then we contacted Desiree, and she really did have great budget-minded ideas that kept my checkbook happy.  I picked up the flowers myself the day of the wedding (to save some more cash). They were packed and ready to go when I arrived, and I was back on the road in no time.  Most importantly, my stressing bride instantly calmed down when she saw how beautiful the flowers turned out.  The flowers looked great in bouquets, on the tables and chairs, and on the cake.  My wife dried some of her bouquet and we placed them in frames on the wall.  I would definetely purchase flowers again from Desiree in a heartbeat.  Highly recommended.

name: Debbie Atchley
text: We chose Flowers by Desiree after receiving one of their arrangements.  They were so helpful and the arrangement we ordered was beautiful.  Their shop is filled with goodies too!

name: Bridgette Pertile
text: My flowers were beautiful and the service was outstanding and very personable!!!  My daughter loved them!  I will definitely be using them for all my future flower needs.

name: Lloyd Winger
text: Unfortunately  I received my bouquet during the recent severe cold spell.  My beautiful arrangement was damaged by the low temp.  Greg from Pelham Flowers by Desiree said they wanted to work with me and make it right.  I greatly appreciate how they handled my situation.  A replacement floral bouquet was offered along with a refund to the sender.  Because of this attitude I will not only return to this business but highly recommend them.  Thank you! P. Winger

name: Destiny Fitch
text: Beautiful work! Will be using Desiree for all my floral needs

name: Jan Davis
text: Real cute place, very hard workers.

name: Ryan Harmon
text: Google hours are wrong. They were closed when I arrived. Hours on weekdays are until 4pm

name: DeAnne Daniels
text: Beautiful arrangement.

name: Julia D
text: It's a nice little park. I used to spend a lot of time there with my then 3 year old.  Parking is not good because if the construction at McDonald Hughes. Plus, the park needs a little maintenance.  There was black fungi all over the place. I was uncomfortable.

name: jcanpalate
text: Be careful... parking lots have potholes

name: Dexter Willis
text: Great

name: Andre Firefighter Young
text: It's alright.  Hours are terrible though

name: R Elaine S (PR88)
text: Thanks for the 20 minutes free.  After finding a place to park, walking across the walk way and getting into the slowest elevator ever to get to the first floor of the hospital this takes at least 5 minutes.  While returning I check my phone it says 8:41 but somehow your ticket machine stamps 8:44. When the ticket has 8:23.  What a SCAM   Pay $4.

name: Colby Lane
text: excellent place for parking.

name: Joe Manns
text: Best place to handle all your needs. Great, caring staff

name: Kay Farley
text: Excellent nurses and doctors very kind and very clean facility

name: regina holloway
text: Was looking for parking deck. No luck and no one could tell me where it was

name: Phil Humphrey
text: Rocks to large to walk or run on, you could easily turn an ankle on parts of walking trail

name: Brenna Bonner
text: Pleasant, clean, shady and lots of great views.

name: Amanda Moore
text: Beautiful trail! Well maintained.

name: Sarah Capps
text: Nice hometown feel

name: Charlie Webster
text: Very nice confortable walk or bike ride

name: Charlie Webster
text: I have walked this trail many times before and it's just a relaxing peaceful walk through some beautiful countryside. Lots of Deer,Turkey and other wildlife is plentiful.

name: sheila larson
text: Beautiful bike trail.  You can also ride horses on it.  They hold a couple of races on it every year.  I don't care to run on it,  but there are a lot who do.

name: Sarah Capps
text: Could use more space but a good pull of place

name: choppy praytor
text: Building more student housing between 3rd an 4th ave south on 13th street

name: Preston Holloway
text: I come here Every. Single. Day. It is like my home away from home. I love scrambling out of my car and darting to get on the bus before it leaves. Oh and when it is pouring down rain and you just walk to your car and accept your fate instead of running and getting shin splints. Nobody has begged me for money or broke into my car yet so this place is great in my book.

name: Anna Price
text: Parking lot gets full around 8 or 9 and you might have to search for a spot. If you have to park far away from the shuttle stop, there is a golf cart that you can catch (although I have not used it, and I am not sure how you would try and get his attention). For a flat lot, it really does a good job of not getting flooded when the rain is heavy (although the roads leading to the lot often do). This is a really well thought out project, but be sure and allow yourself plenty of commute time once you arrive at the lot.

name: shondria young
text: UAB shuttle buses were timely, efficient, staff were courteous to and from legion field.

name: Joylene Bill
text: Convenient

name: Sharron Gregg
text: Easy to get to.

name: Catherine Battle
text: Need more parking

name: Cynthia McFarlin-Robinson
text: Secure

name: Philip Haynes
text:
(Translated by Google) Uab sucks
S

(Original)
Uab sucks
S

name: Anne Jones
text: Beautiful park! So big!!

name: Ivorie Crear
text: Ok

name: T Denton
text: The library festival was going on. The Maurice Sendak exhibit was open. My son checked out many music CDS. Is was a good experience.

name: JR H
text: I have no idea what this is about. Google GPS is too non-selective.

name: Kevin Richardson
text: open lot

name: Brian Graves
text: Nice cemetery.

name: Tiffany Lee
text: Nice

name: Chrsitina Hornsby
text: Would have liked to see security driving around. Because my car broke down

name: Teresa Hill Berry
text: I ordered a pair of Gloria Vanderbilt blue jeans I gave the young lady my address I got an email with the incorrect address I call and to correct the issue I called both the store as well as online. It was my understanding that they corrected my address my apartment number was the issue. What happened next I received two separate orders for the same pair of blue jeans then I had to wait practically a month before I received a return shipment label meanwhile as usual at Belk they want to add interest to your account on the second pair blue jeans so as usual They delayed shipping you the return label as much as possible. I never shop on Black Friday not even by phone. After the shooting at the Galleria means but I will continue not shopping at the Galleria in Riverchase on Black Friday. Other than that I enjoy shopping at the Riverchase Galleria here and Birmingham Alabama. Last week I learned that the mall manager have made a conscious decision that all disabled buses should be picked up in front of Macy's where there's nowhere to sit and you are outside in the elements after you shop at this mall. Now that is just too much. That's saying we only want you here if you have your own car. I ride the max VIP and that's what they told me last week. now I am forced to shop online I shopped at Macy's and went all the way down to Belk for my pick up after I shop there. Now I have to order online. Is the mall manager I racist is that what I'm getting from this. They are discriminating against the disabled. There is a law to prohibit that.

name: Paula Smith
text: Huge beautiful mall

name: Kyle Kozma
text:
Where to begin. I am a Marriott Rewards Member and when I travel, I stay at the Hotels. This particular Courtyard needs to revamp their services.
1) Room Service / Cleaning only happens when requested.
2) Bistro Cafe - the prices are Ridiculous high.Food isn't that great. Pic to follow.
3)Bartender was sick or coming down with a Cold. Coughing while serving and wrapping silverware.
4) Room Cleaned 1 time during a 1 wk stay, No shampoo, No Conditioner, No Coffee, nothing stocked....Not sure the sheets were changed. Trash wasn't emptied
5) Parking Lot was full, Unable to park in front of my 1st floor room until 3rd night there.
6) Best thing about the room was the Water pressure in the Shower.
7) The picture posted cost me $17.00. The fries were $7.50.

Next trip....Will try the Fairfield Inn next door or stay in Mobile and not Spanish Fort.

name: Jeramy Durham
text: Easy parking for hotels.
